group_1.textLeft: Mami?
Man, ya look spooked...@What happened...?
Huh?@[chara:200601:motion_0]Kamihama?
Well, I haven't had much time...@So, no. [chara:200601:motion_100]I haven't dropped by yet.
Thank goodness?@[chara:200601:face_mtn_ex_030.exp.json:cheek_0]...What's that supposed to mean?
Calm down and tell me everything.
What's got ya so shaken up?

group_1.textRight: ...come across a Witch that @could pass as a human?

group_1.textLeft: Pass as a[chara:200601:motion_0]...human?
Ya lost me...@What are ya gettin' at here?

group_1.textRight: I saw one.@Today, in Kamihama. I saw one.
A Witch disguised as a human...

group_1.textLeft: ...The heck...?
Ya mean some wild Magical Girl, right?
...Okay, okay, don't get crabby...

group_1.textRight: ...Not too long ago, I saw…someone@I thought was human...
And they turned into a Witch...@Transformed, I guess...?
It took a shape like yours or mine… And@it's blending in with other Magical Girls...

group_1.textLeft: No kiddin'...
Never knew there were Witches @that were that cunnin'...
First I've ever heard of it.

group_1.textRight: I really saw it! With my own eyes!@It is the reality we are living in now.
I don't want you to go there, no matter how@many Grief Seeds you may be able to get.

group_1.textLeft: Gotcha...@[chara:200601:lipSynch_0][freeze:1][chara:200601:cheek_0:face_mtn_ex_000.exp.json][chara:200601:lipSynch_1]So lemme get this straight...
The main point of this big lecture of yours@was to persuade me not to go to Kamihama.
...Okay.@So let's say I don't go to Kamihama...
The cities and towns around Kamihama@don't exactly have many Witches...
So just what're ya suggestin' I do?

group_1.textRight: Well, I would say you should take care of@what Witches you can, no matter how few.
If you can't get enough Grief Seeds,@I can give you some of the ones I collect.

group_1.textLeft: ...That still kinda sounds like [freeze:0.7][chara:200601:motion_1:cheek_0:face_mtn_ex_010.exp.json]you're@givin' me a job that doesn't need doin'.
Just be a good girl, keep safe, and@watch from the sidelines. Right?
...Back when I'd just become a Magical Girl,@I never did that...
So what? [freeze_1.5][chara:200601:motion_1]Yer gonna be my captain and just@steer me in the right direction?

group_1.textRight: Let me breathe wind into your sails.
That's just how bizarre this city is.

group_1.textLeft: ...@[chara:200601:lipSynch_1]Geeze, okay, fine, whatever.
I'll be a good girl.@Just sit back and watch ya deal.
